title: FFI Connectivity Check Request
description: Schema defining the request format for initiating a connectivity check for an FFI client in production.

connectivityCheckReference.title: Connectivity Check Reference
connectivityCheckReference.description: A unique reference identifier for the connectivity check request, ensuring traceability between request and response.

connectivityRequestText.title: Connectivity Request Text
connectivityRequestText.description: Optional request message providing additional details about the connectivity verification process.
examples: Initiating connectivity check towards Bank B

connectivityCheckTimestamp.title: Connectivity Check Timestamp
connectivityCheckTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the connectivity check request was initiated, in ISO 8601 format.

connectivityResponseType.title: Connectivity Response Type
connectivityResponseType.description: Optionally, used to control the Connectivity Response Type. Is by default SUCCESS. If set to ERROR, the receiver should respond with an error response message according to the error schema.

examples.connectivityRequestText: Initiating connectivity check towards Bank B
